cause.description:
The goal of this cause is to raise support and potentially raise money to give impoverished youth a chance to succeed. The ultimate goal would be to start a NPO with the same cause and to raise money for programs to help children and young adults born into poverty to achieve success in life.
1. Minimum wage needs to be raised to at least $7.50
2. Create housing vouchers to move poor families into higher income areas
3. Strengthen Public Schools
cause.mission: minimize and eventually end poverty in America.
cause.name: American Society Against Poverty
